Title: Napoleon Prestige 500 Propane Gas Grill with Infrared Rear Burner and Infrared Side Burner and Rotisserie Kit - P500RSIBPSS-3
Description:
Key FeaturesSafetyGlow Night Light illuminated controlsFour stainless steel burners deliver impressive heat and longevityRear infrared rotisserie burner and rotisserie kit allows you to slow roast food with restaurant quality resultsHigh heat infrared side burner allows you to sear just like a steakhouse while other dishes cook on the grillJetfire ignition system is designed to safely and reliably light the burnersThe Napoleon Prestige 500 blends quality and performance into one package. This freestanding propane gas grill has four stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 48,000 BTUs of cooking power. The grill has stainless steel cooking grates with 500 square inches of main cooking area and 260 square inches across the plated steel warming area for a total of 760 square inches of cooking area. The Napoleon Jetfire ignition with crossover lighting starts each burner individually for a reliable start up every time and allows you to light all the burners at the same time. The stainless steel wave cooking grids create the trademark Napoleon sear lines and allow for better heat retention. The dual level, stainless steel, sear plates vaporize drippings, control flare ups and keep your food moist. This Prestige 500 also has a 18,000 BTU rear infrared burner and rotisserie kit for roasting and a 14,000 BTU infrared side burner for searing meats. The hood features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge, cast aluminum end caps and retains heat for oven-like performance. The SafetyGlow control knobs turn from blue to red when a burner is in use. Clean up is a cinch with the full width removable drip pan. The stainless steel grill cart features folding shelves with integrated utensil holders, double doors for storage and easy roll locking casters for moving the grill around. This Napoleon grill is manufactured in Canada.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Prestige PRO 665 Built-in Natural Gas Grill with Infrared Rear Burner and Rotisserie Kit - BIPRO665RBNSS-3
Description:
Key FeaturesLED Spectrum Night Light control knobs with SafetyGlowFive stainless steel burners deliver impressive heat and longevityRear infrared rotisserie burner and rotisserie kit allows you to slow roast food with restaurant quality resultsJetfire ignition system is designed to safely and reliably light the burnersWood chip tray with dedicated burner infuses your food with smokey aromaticsThe Napoleon Prestige PRO 665 brings engineered quality at an economical price to your grilling experience. This built-in natural gas grill has five stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 60,000 BTUs of cooking power. The grill has stainless steel cooking grates with 665 square inches of main cooking area and 335 square inches of warming area for a total of 1000 square inches of cooking area. Easily turn the burners on with flame ignition for a reliable start up. The stainless steel wave cooking grids create the trademark Napoleon sear lines. The stainless steel, self-cleaning sear plates vaporize drippings, control flare ups and keep your food moist. The Prestige PRO 665 also has a 18,000 BTU stainless steel rear infrared burner for slow cooking with the rotisserie kit. An integrated wood chip smoker tray pulls out for easy filling and has a dedicated 8,000 BTU burner that creates delicious smoke flavor. The hood features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge, stainless steel end caps and retains heat for oven-like performance. The LED Spectrum Night Light control knobs have near limitless color options making your night time entertaining a breeze, and they glow red when a burner is in use while two interior lights illuminate the grilling surface. Clean up is a cinch with the full width removable drip pan. This Napoleon grill is manufactured in Canada.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Prestige PRO 665 Propane Gas Grill with Infrared Rear Burner and Infrared Side Burner and Rotisserie Kit - PRO665RSIBPSS-3
Description:
Key FeaturesLED Spectrum Night Light control knobs with SafetyGlowFive stainless steel burners deliver impressive heat and longevityRear infrared rotisserie burner and rotisserie kit allows you to slow roast food with restaurant quality resultsHigh heat infrared side burner allows you to sear just like a steakhouse while other dishes cook on the grillWood chip tray with dedicated burner infuses your food with smokey aromaticsThe Napoleon Prestige PRO 665 brings engineered quality at an economical price to your grilling experience. This freestanding propane gas grill has five stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 60,000 BTUs of cooking power. The grill has stainless steel cooking grates with 665 square inches of main cooking area and 335 square inches of warming area for a total of 1000 square inches of cooking area. Easily turn the burners on with flame ignition for a reliable start up. The stainless steel wave cooking grids create the trademark Napoleon sear lines. The stainless steel, self-cleaning sear plates vaporize drippings, control flare ups and keep your food moist. The Prestige PRO 665 also has a 18,000 BTU stainless steel rear infrared burner for slow cooking with the rotisserie kit and 13,000 BTU infrared side burner for searing meats. An integrated wood chip smoker tray pulls out for easy filling and has a dedicated 8,000 BTU burner that creates delicious smoke flavor. The hood features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge, stainless steel end caps and retains heat for oven-like performance. The LED Spectrum Night Light control knobs have near limitless color options making your night time entertaining a breeze, and they glow red when a burner is in use while two interior lights illuminate the grilling surface. Clean up is a cinch with the full width removable drip pan. The stainless steel grill cart features an integrated ice bucket, cutting board, side shelves and double doors for storage and easy roll locking casters for moving the grill around. Minimal assembly required because the grill cart comes fully assembled with the exception of the cart side shelves and the grill head. Description:
Key FeaturesEasy start up with Jetfire ignition and crossover lightingStainless steel wave cooking grids for patented Napoleon sear marksHigh heat infrared side burner allows you to sear just like a steakhouse while other dishes cook on the grillDual-Level stainless steel sear plates to vaporize drippings, control flare-ups, and keep food moistGrill cart features, tool hooks, folding side shelves, propane tank stability ring, and easy locking caster wheelsThe Napoleon Rogue XT 525 propane gas grill boasts four stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 48,000 BTUs of cooking power. Between the main grilling area, large warming rack, and infrared side burner, the Napoleon Rouge XT 525 features a total of 805 square inches of cooking area, providing plenty of room to cook your favorite foods. The Napoleon Jetfire ignition ensures a controlled flame and a quick and easy start up every time. Dual level stainless steel sear plates vaporize drippings, provide even heat distribution, and help keep your food moist. The high top stainless steel lid provides extra cooking space, retains heat for oven-like performance, and features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge for measuring the precise internal temperature of your grill. Stainless steel wave cooking grids deliver those famous Napoleon sear lines, and the 9,000 BTU Sizzle Zone infrared side burner allows you to quickly sear steaks and chops, locking in flavor. The durable powder coated grill cart features stainless steel double access doors, folding side shelves with integrated tool hooks, built-in propane tank storage, and Easy Roll locking casters for moving the grill around.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Built-In 700 Series Propane Dual Infrared Burner with Stainless Steel Cover - BIB18IRPSS
Description:
Key FeaturesProvides extra space to cook restaurant quality steaks over very high heatMarine grade stainless steel construction ensures a long lifeNIGHT LIGHT Control Knobs with Safety Glow turn red when burner is onThick, 75 mm stainless steel cooking grids are low maintenance and feature the Napoleon WAVE patternPower supply kit (N370-1091-SER) required for use (Sold Separately)The Infrared SIZZLE ZONE can be used to produce the perfect sear on meat or used to create sides and sauces while the main grill is in use. This propane 18-inch, dual burner, drop-in Infrared SIZZLE ZONE burner provides loads of space to sear succulent steaks to restaurant-quality perfection. Made from the same quality of marine-grade stainless steel as the 700 Series built-in grills, this drop-in side burner matches your custom outdoor kitchen. These burners provide stylish longevity and were built with ease of install in mind. Virtually maintenance-free 7.5-mm cooking grids deliver the iconic WAVE sear marks that tell your meal was cooked on a Napoleon. Ignite the burners one-handed using the JETFIRE instant ignition system. The ergonomic NIGHT LIGHT control knobs with Safety Glow which provide ambiance and safety, glowing a glorious blue and changing to red when burners are in use. The power supply kit N370-1091-SER is required for all Built-in 700 Series burners being used in an application without a Built-in 700 Series Built-in Grill in order to supply power for the NIGHT LIGHT control knobs.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Built-In 500 Series 32-Inch Propane Gas Grill - BI32PSS
Description: Key FeaturesBuilt-in trim for a truly seamless installationConstructed from 304 grade stainless steel for durability and longevityQuick and reliable ignition system every time you fire up the grillVirtually maintenance-free cooking grids that give food the iconic Napoleon Wave sear marksMultilevel grilling with the two position warming rack for perfect cooking or keeping food warmNapoleon Reliability in a Built-in Grill Napoleon's Built-in 500 Series Propane Grill is designed to install seamlessly into your BBQ island. Made with 304 Stainless Steel, the Built-in 500 grill is durable and stylish, laser-focused on performance. 4 Stainless Steel Burners Burners are the heart of any gas grill. Napoleon's 16-gauge premium 304 stainless steel burner tubes are reinforced and feature an industry-leading design that provides proven longevity, performance, and efficiency. Complete combustion is the key, and these burners balance fuel and oxygen to generate a clean burn. Dual gas ports on the top and sides of each burner ensure even heating along the burner and produced fewer flare-ups. Instant JETFIRE Ignition If a grill doesn't reliably light, it's not a reliable grill. Napoleon's Instant JETFIRE ignition lights the first time, every time. The design sends a jet of flame to light each burner individually. You can light your grill with the twist of your writs. Batteries not required! With cross-lighting burners, in the unlikely event that a burner goes out or fails to light, it automatically relights. There's a cross-light bracket between burners that passes the flame to the unlit burner, assuring safe and reliable grilling. Dual-Level Stainless Steel Sear PlatesNapoleon's sear plates help create the kind of BBQ flavor you love. When you grill, the plates are heated. As juices and sauces drip onto the plates, the drippings are vaporized to create smoke and steam that bathes the food in flavor. Additionally, the sear plates are staggered on multi-levels, creating even coverage across the grilling surface. This helps ensure even heating throughout your grill.7.5mm Stainless Steel Iconic Wave Cooking Grids Never underestimate the power of heavy-duty stainless steel cooking grids! As you can see, the Wave design is like no other, but it's not just because they look cool. The wave encourages even heating and provides more surface area, prevents food from falling through, and keeps the grill cleaner. The shape increases the grates' longevity by allowing for even expansion and contraction, reducing heat and cold's effect on the metal. Napoleon Built-in 500 Propane Grill FAQCan I convert the Built-in 500 propane grill to natural gas?Napoleon grills are gas specific and shouldn't be modified in any way. Fortunately, we carry the Built-in 500 Natural Gas version!How big is the Built-in 500 grill?The Built-in 500 is 33.5-in wide, 27.6-in deep, and 24-in high. It weighs 160 lbs. The main cooking grid is 29.5 x 18 inches, for a main grilling area of 525 square inches. The secondary grilling area totals 261 square inches.Do I need an insulated grill jacket for the Built-in 500 grill?The cabinet frame and cabinet MUST be made from non-combustible material! If not, you need to install the grill with the Napoleon Zero Clearance Liner. Note: the item description specifies the 700 Series grill, but Napoleon confirms this liner also works for the Built-in 500.{ @context: https://schema.org, @type: FAQPage, mainEntity: [{ @type: Question, name: Can I convert the Built-in 500 propane grill to natural gas?, acceptedAnswer: { @type: Answer, text: Napoleon grills are gas specific and shouldn't be modified in any way. Fortunately, we carry the Built-in 500 Natural Gas version! } },{ @type: Question, name: How big is the Built-in 500 grill?, acceptedAnswer: { @type: Answer, text: The Built-in 500 grill is 33.5-in wide, 27.6-in deep, and 24-in high. It weighs 160 lbs. The main cooking grid is 29.5 x 18 inches, for a main grilling area of 525 square inches. The secondary grilling area totals 261 square inches. } },{@type: Question, name: Do I need an insulated grill jacket for the Built-in 500 grill?, acceptedAnswer: { @type: Answer, text: The cabinet frame and cabinet the grill is being mounted into MUST be made from non-combustible material! If not, you need to install the grill with the Napoleon Zero Clearance Liner. Note: the item description specifies the 700 Series grill, but Napoleon confirms this liner also works for the Built-in 500. } }]}Legal disclaimers and warnings Product packaging, owners’ manuals, installation instructions, and/or operating instructions may include more information than what is shown on our website. Title: Napoleon Prestige PRO 825 Built-in Propane Gas Grill with Infrared Rear Burner and Infrared Sear Burners and Rotisserie Kit - BIPRO825RBIPSS-3
Description:
Key FeaturesTwin head cooking system features a separate searing section instead of taking up space on the main grilling areaLED Spectrum Night Light control knobs with SafetyGlowFour stainless steel burners deliver impressive heat and longevityRear infrared rotisserie burner and rotisserie kit allows you to slow roast food with restaurant quality resultsWood chip tray with dedicated burner infuses your food with smokey aromaticsThe Napoleon Prestige PRO 825 combines the power of infrared grilling and the Napoleon stainless steel cooking system in one grill. This built-in propane gas grill has a twin head cooking system for more grilling versatility. Sear the perfect steak using the infrared burner while you bake a cake on the conventional side. One side has four stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 48,000 BTUs of cooking power while the other side has two ceramic infrared burners that produce 24,000 BTUs, reaching high heat in seconds, and ideal for searing restaurant quality steaks. The two infrared burners have an 8,000 BTU stainless steel tube warming burner between them. The grill has stainless steel cooking grates with 825 square inches of main cooking area and 420 square inches across the stainless steel warming area for a total of 1245 square inches of cooking area. Easily turn the burners on with a flame thrower ignition for a reliable start up. The stainless steel wave cooking grids create the trademark Napoleon sear lines. The stainless steel, self-cleaning sear plates vaporize drippings, control flare ups and keep your food moist. The Prestige PRO 825 also has an 18,000 BTU stainless steel rear infrared burner for slow cooking with the rotisserie kit. An integrated wood chip smoker tray pulls out for easy filling and has a dedicated 8,000 BTU burner that creates delicious smoke flavor. The hood features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge, stainless steel end caps and retains heat for oven-like performance. The LED Spectrum Night Light control knobs have near limitless color options making your night time entertaining a breeze, and they glow red when a burner is in use while two interior lights illuminate the grilling surface. Clean up is a cinch with the full width removable drip pan. This Napoleon grill is manufactured in Canada.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Built-In 500 Series 32-Inch Natural Gas Grill - BI32NSS
Description:
Key FeaturesBuilt-in trim for a truly seamless installationConstructed from 304 grade stainless steel for durability and longevityQuick and reliable ignition system every time you fire up the grillVirtually maintenance-free cooking grids that give food the iconic Napoleon Wave sear marksMultilevel grilling with the two position warming rack for perfect cooking or keeping food warmNapoleon Reliability in a Built-in Grill Napoleon Built-in 500 Series Natural Gas Grill is designed to install seamlessly into your BBQ island. Made with 304 Stainless Steel, the Built-in 500 grill is durable and stylish, laser-focused on performance. 4 Stainless Steel Burners Burners are the heart of any gas grill. Napoleon 16-gauge premium 304 stainless steel burner tubes are reinforced and feature an industry-leading design that provides proven longevity, performance, and efficiency. Complete combustion is the key, and these burners balance fuel and oxygen to generate a clean burn. Dual gas ports on the top and sides of each burner ensure even heating along the burner and produced fewer flare-ups. Instant JETFIRE Ignition If a grill does not reliably light, it is not a reliable grill. Napoleon Instant JETFIRE ignition lights the first time, every time. The design sends a jet of flame to light each burner individually. You can light your grill with the twist of your writs. Batteries not required! With cross-lighting burners, in the unlikely event that a burner goes out or fails to light, it automatically relights. There is a cross-light bracket between burners that passes flame to the unlit burner, assuring safe and reliable grilling. Dual-Level Stainless Steel Sear PlatesNapoleon sear plates help create the kind of BBQ flavor you love. When you grill, the plates are heated. As juices and sauces drip onto the, the drippings are vaporized to create smoke and steam that bathes the food in flavor. Additionally, the sear plates are staggered on multi levels, creating even coverage across the grilling surface. This helps ensure even heating throughout your grill.7.5mm Stainless Steel Iconic Wave Cooking Grids Never underestimate the power of heavy-duty stainless steel cooking grids! As you can see, the Wave design is like no other, but it is not just because they look cool. The wave encourages even heating and provides more surface area, prevents food from falling through, and keeps the grill cleaner. The shape increases the grates longevity by allowing for even expansion and contraction, reducing the effect that heat and cold have on the metal. Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Prestige 500 Propane Gas Grill - P500PSS-3
Description:
Key FeaturesSafetyGlow Night Light illuminated controlsFour stainless steel burners deliver impressive heat and longevityJetfire ignition system is designed to safely and reliably light the burnersDual-Level stainless steel sear plates to vaporize drippings, control flare-ups, and keep food moistCart has folding side shelves with integrated utensil holders, double doors for storage and easy roll locking castersThe Napoleon Prestige 500 blends quality and performance into one package. This freestanding propane gas grill has four stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 48,000 BTUs of cooking power. Title: Napoleon Prestige PRO 825 Built-in Natural Gas Grill with Infrared Rear Burner and Infrared Sear Burners and Rotisserie Kit - BIPRO825RBINSS-3
Description:
Key FeaturesTwin head cooking system features a separate searing section instead of taking up space on the main grilling areaLED Spectrum Night Light control knobs with SafetyGlowFour stainless steel burners deliver impressive heat and longevityRear infrared rotisserie burner and rotisserie kit allows you to slow roast food with restaurant quality resultsWood chip tray with dedicated burner infuses your food with smokey aromaticsThe Napoleon Prestige PRO 825 combines the power of infrared grilling and the Napoleon stainless steel cooking system in one grill. This built-in natural gas grill has a twin head cooking system for more grilling versatility. Sear the perfect steak using the infrared burner while you bake a cake on the conventional side. One side has four stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 48,000 BTUs of cooking power while the other side has two ceramic infrared burners that produce 24,000 BTUs, reaching high heat in seconds, and ideal for searing restaurant quality steaks. The two infrared burners have an 8,000 BTU stainless steel tube warming burner between them. The grill has stainless steel cooking grates with 825 square inches of main cooking area and 420 square inches across the stainless steel warming area for a total of 1245 square inches of cooking area. Easily turn the burners on with a flame thrower ignition for a reliable start up. The stainless steel wave cooking grids create the trademark Napoleon sear lines. The stainless steel, self-cleaning sear plates vaporize drippings, control flare ups and keep your food moist. The Prestige PRO 825 also has a 18,000 BTU stainless steel rear infrared burner for slow cooking with the rotisserie kit. An integrated wood chip smoker tray pulls out for easy filling and has a dedicated 8,000 BTU burner that creates delicious smoke flavor. The hood features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge, stainless steel end caps and retains heat for oven-like performance. The LED Spectrum Night Light control knobs have near limitless color options making your night time entertaining a breeze, and they glow red when a burner is in use while two interior lights illuminate the grilling surface. Clean up is a cinch with the full width removable drip pan. This Napoleon grill is manufactured in Canada.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Prestige PRO 825 Natural Gas Grill with Infrared Rear Burner, Double Infrared Sear Burner & Side Burner and Rotisserie Kit -  PRO825RSBINSS-3
Description:
Key FeaturesTwin head cooking system features a separate searing section instead of taking up space on the main grilling areaLED Spectrum Night Light control knobs with SafetyGlowFour stainless steel burners deliver impressive heat and longevityRear infrared rotisserie burner and rotisserie kit allows you to slow roast food with restaurant quality resultsWood chip tray with dedicated burner infuses your food with smokey aromaticsThe Napoleon Prestige PRO 825 combines the power of infrared grilling and the Napoleon stainless steel cooking system in one grill. This freestanding natural gas grill has a twin head cooking system for more grilling versatility. Sear the perfect steak using the infrared burner while you bake a cake on the conventional side. One side has four stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 48,000 BTUs of cooking power while the other side has two ceramic infrared burners that produce 24,000 BTUs, reaching high heat in seconds, and ideal for searing restaurant quality steaks. The two infrared burners have an 8,000 BTU stainless steel tube warming burner between them. The grill has stainless steel cooking grates with 825 square inches of main cooking area and 420 square inches across the stainless steel warming area for a total of 1245 square inches of cooking area. Easily turn the burners on with a flame thrower ignition for a reliable start up. The stainless steel wave cooking grids create the trademark Napoleon sear lines. The stainless steel, self-cleaning sear plates vaporize drippings, control flare ups and keep your food moist. The Prestige PRO 825 also has an 18,000 BTU stainless steel rear infrared burner for slow cooking with the rotisserie kit and a 17,000 BTU power side burner. An integrated wood chip smoker tray pulls out for easy filling and has a dedicated 8,000 BTU burner that creates delicious smoke flavor. The hood features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge, stainless steel end caps and retains heat for oven-like performance. The LED Spectrum Night Light control knobs have near limitless color options making your nighttime entertaining a breeze, and they glow red when a burner is in use while two interior lights illuminate the grilling surface. Clean up is a cinch with the full width removable drip pan. The stainless steel grill cart also features two pull-out drawers and double doors for storage and easy roll locking casters for moving the grill around. Minimal assembly is required because the grill cart comes fully assembled with the exception of the cart side shelves and the grill head. Please note, due to the weight of this item white glove delivery service is not available. This Napoleon grill is manufactured in Canada.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Phantom Prestige 500 Propane Grill w/ Infrared Rear Burner, Infrared Side Burner, & Rotisserie Kit - P500RSIBPK-3-PHM
Description:
Key FeaturesGrill in style with premium Phantom matte black finished surfacesMultifunctional warming rack designed with cutouts for grilling wings and appetizersSafetyGlow Night Light illuminated controlsInfrared rear burner & rotisserie kit allows you to slow roast food with restaurant quality resultsHigh heat infrared side burner allows you to sear just like a steakhouseThe Napoleon Phantom Prestige 500 blends quality and performance into one package and features edgy styling with luxurious matte black finishes. This freestanding propane grill has four stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 48,000 BTUs of cooking power. The grill has cast stainless steel cooking grates with 500 square inches of main cooking area and 240 square inches across the stainless steel multifunctional warming rack for a total of 740 square inches of cooking area. The Napoleon Jetfire ignition with crossover lighting starts each burner individually for a reliable start up every time and allows you to light all the burners at the same time. The cast stainless steel wave cooking grids create the trademark Napoleon sear lines and allow for better heat retention. The dual level, stainless steel, sear plates vaporize drippings, control flare ups and keep your food moist. The multifunctional warming rack is designed with special cutouts for grilling wings and appetizers. This Phantom Prestige 500 also has a 18,000 BTU rear infrared burner and rotisserie kit for roasting and a 14,000 BTU infrared side burner for searing meats. The hood features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge, cast aluminum end caps and retains heat for oven-like performance. The SafetyGlow control knobs turn from blue to red when a burner is in use. Clean up is a cinch with the full width removable drip pan. The grill cart is made of durable, rust and corrosion resistant black steel, features folding shelves with integrated utensil holders, double doors for storage and easy roll locking casters for moving the grill around. This Napoleon grill is manufactured in Canada.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Prestige 665 Natural Gas Grill with Infrared Rear Burner and Infrared Side Burner and Rotisserie Kit - P665RSIBNSS
Description:
Key FeaturesSafetyGlow Night Light illuminated controlsFive stainless steel burners deliver impressive heat and longevityRear infrared rotisserie burner and rotisserie kit allows you to slow roast food with restaurant quality resultsHigh heat infrared side burner allows you to sear just like a steakhouse while other dishes cook on the grillJetfire ignition system is designed to safely and reliably light the burnersThe Napoleon Prestige 665 brings engineered quality and economical price to your grilling experience. This freestanding natural gas grill has four stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 60,000 BTUs of cooking power. The grill has stainless steel cooking grids with 665 square inches of main cooking area and 447 square inches across the plated steel warming area for a total of 1142 square inches of cooking area. The Napoleon Jetfire ignition with crossover lighting starts each burner individually for a reliable start up every time and allows you to light all the burners at the same time. The stainless steel wave cooking grids create the trademark Napoleon sear lines and allow for better heat retention. The dual level, stainless steel, sear plates vaporize drippings, control flare ups and keep your food moist. This Prestige 665 also has a 18,000 BTU rear infrared burner and rotisserie kit for roasting and a 14,000 BTU infrared side burner for searing meats. The hood features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge, cast aluminum end caps and retains heat for oven-like performance. The SafetyGlow control knobs turn from blue to red when a burner is in use. Clean up is a cinch with the full width removable drip pan. The stainless steel grill cart features folding shelves with integrated utensil holders, double doors for storage and easy roll locking casters for moving the grill around. This Napoleon grill is manufactured in Canada.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Professional Freestanding Charcoal Grill
Description:
Key FeaturesCharcoal pan can be adjusted for multilevel heat controlAdjustable air vents for controlling the temperatureCharcoal rotisserie burner for restaurant quality cookingFront loading door allows for adding charcoal while cookingIncludes two charcoal dividers for direct or indirect cookingCombining traditional charcoal grilling with modern styling and performance, the Napoleon Professional Charcoal Grill does it all. Solidly constructed from durable 304 stainless steel, this Napoleon grill has 605 square inches of main cooking area and 240 square inches of warming area for a total of 845 square inches of cooking area. This grill has an amazing, exclusive rotisserie burner powered by charcoal for roasting meat like a professional chef (rotisserie kit not included). The porcelainized cast iron wave cooking grates efficiently retain heat and create unique, perfect sear lines on your food. This grill features an adjustable, full width charcoal bed with an easy to use handle and convenient front loading charcoal door for easy filling. It also has adjustable air vents for increased heat control. Discover the versatility of this unique grill with the included charcoal dividers, which allow you to cook low and slow over indirect heat, or sear with direct heat. The tightly sealed, double-walled hood features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge and retains heat for oven-like performance. The ash and drip pan slide out when you are done cooking for quick and easy cleaning. Title: Napoleon Phantom Rogue SE 425 Natural Gas Grill w/ Infrared Rear Burner & Infrared Side Burner - RSE425RSIBNK-1-PHM
Description: Key FeaturesGrill in style with premium Phantom matte black finished surfacesMultifunctional warming rack designed with cutouts for grilling wings and appetizersHigh heat infrared side burner allows you to sear just like a steakhouseRear infrared rotisserie burner allows you to slow roast food with restaurant quality resultsGrill cart features, tool hooks, folding side shelves, and easy locking caster wheelsGoing Rogue has Never Tasted So Good Napoleon put a great deal of thought into designing their Rogue series of gas grills. They packed performance into an eye-catching form and created freestanding grills with carts that are more than just a stand for a grill. Phantom Matte Black Finished Surfaces If you dont want to be like everybody else on the block with a shiny silver-ish grill, Napoleons Phantom Rogue SE 425 RSIB Natural Gas Grill offers edgy styling with luxurious, silky black matte finishes. Napoleon refers to it as low-key luxury, but it's more than just a look these grills offer high performance AND high styling! Infrared Rear Rotisserie Burner Perfect for high heat searing and slow spit roasting for succulent roasted meals. (Rotisserie kit sold separately) Large Infrared Sizzle Zone™ Side BurnerGet the perfect steakhouse-quality sear! The Phantom Rogue SE 425 RSIB's IR side burner is more efficient and gets much hotter (up to 1,800 degrees F!) than a conventional burner, giving it the power to quickly sear meat and deliver the much-desired caramelized crust, sealing in flavor and juices. With an infrared burner, you're actually cooking with the power of light energy. 3 Stainless Steel Burners Burners are the heart of any gas grill. Napoleon's 16-gauge premium 304 stainless steel burner tubes are reinforced and feature an industry-leading design that provides proven longevity, performance, and efficiency. Complete combustion is the key, and these burners balance fuel and oxygen to generate a clean burn. Dual gas ports on the top and sides of each burner ensure even heating along the burner and produced fewer flare-ups. Instant JETFIRE™ Ignition If a grill doesn't reliably light, it's not a reliable grill. Napoleon's Instant JETFIRE ignition lights the first time, every time. The design sends a jet of flame to light each burner individually. You can light your grill with the twist of your writs. Batteries not required! With cross-lighting burners, in the unlikely event that a burner goes out or fails to light, it automatically relights. There's a cross-light bracket between burners that passes flame to the unlit burner, assuring safe and reliable grilling. High Top Lid Napoleon Rogue heavy-duty high top lids pivot on a central point to keep the opening within the same space as the body of the grill. In addition, though the lids are heavy, the design provides leverage to easily lift the grill's lid. The higher height gives you space to grill larger meats, and the double layer of insulation works to keep the heat in and helps it circulate for greater heat control. Stainless Steel Iconic Wave Cooking Grids Never underestimate the power of heavy-duty stainless steel cooking grids! As you can see, the Wave design is like no other and it's not just because they look cool. The wave encourages even heating and provides more surface area, prevents food from falling through, and keeps the grill cleaner. The shape increases the grates' longevity by allowing for even expansion and contraction, reducing the effect that heat and cold have on the metal. Backlit Ergonomic Control Knobs Like the feel of a steering wheel, or the knobs of a high-end stereo, the smooth grip and robust shape of the Rogue knobs give you excellent control. Illuminated to prevent the where do I have everything set? guessing game after the sun goes down. A Grill Cart that is Much More than Just a Cart The Phantom Rogue SE 425 RSIB's cart is functional and offers features not generally found at this price point. The enclosed design protects the contents from the elements and provides long-lasting durability. There are tool hooks on each side shelf to help you keep your grilling tools within reach without cluttering up the stainless steel folding shelf, and a condiment basket to store your favorite spices and sauces. The cart rests on locking casters for extra stability. Napoleon Phantom Rogue SE 425 FAQCan I convert the Rogue SE 425 natural gas grill to propane?Napoleon grills are gas specific and shouldn't be modified in any way. Fortunately, we carry the Phantom Rogue SE 425 Propane version!How big is the Phantom Rogue SE 425 RSIB?The Rogue SE 425 RSIB is 55-in wide with the shelf up, 25-in deep, and 48.5-in high. It weighs 144 lbs. The main cooking grid is 23.5 x 18 inches, for a main grilling area of 425 square inches. The secondary grilling area totals 160 square inches.Is there a built-in verion of the Rogue SE 425 RSIB?Unfortunately, Napoleon doesn't produce built-in models of the Rogue series.{@context: https://schema.org,@type: FAQPage,mainEntity: [{@type: Question, name: Can I convert the Rogue SE 425 natural gas grill to propane?, acceptedAnswer: { @type: Answer, text: Napoleon grills are gas specific and shouldn't be modified in any way. Fortunately, we carry the Phantom Rogue SE 425 Propane version! }},{@type: Question,name: How big is the Phantom Rogue SE 425 RSIB?, acceptedAnswer: { @type: Answer, text: The Phantom Rogue SE 425 RSIB is 55-in wide with the shelf up, 25-in deep, and 48.5-in high. It weighs 144 lbs. The main cooking grid is 23.5 x 18 inches, for a main grilling area of 425 square inches. The secondary grilling area totals 160 square inches. } },{@type: Question, name: Is there a built-in version of the Rogue SE 425 RSIB?, acceptedAnswer: {@type: Answer, text: Unfortunately, Napoleon doesn't produce built-in models of the Rogue series. } }]}Legal disclaimers and warnings Product packaging, owners’ manuals, installation instructions, and/or operating instructions may include more information than what is shown on our website. Title: Napoleon Phantom Prestige 500 Natural Gas Grill Bundle w/Cover, Charcoal Tray, Rotisserie Basket & Drip Trays
Description:
Key FeaturesGrill in style with premium Phantom matte black finished surfacesMultifunctional warming rack designed with cutouts for grilling wings and appetizersSafetyGlow Night Light illuminated controlsInfrared rear burner & rotisserie kit allows you to slow roast food with restaurant quality resultsHigh heat infrared side burner allows you to sear just like a steakhouseThe Napoleon Phantom Prestige 500 blends quality and performance into one package and features edgy styling with luxurious matte black finishes. This freestanding natural gas grill has four stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 48,000 BTUs of cooking power. The grill has cast stainless steel cooking grates with 500 square inches of main cooking area and 240 square inches across the stainless steel multifunctional warming rack for a total of 740 square inches of cooking area. The Napoleon Jetfire ignition with crossover lighting starts each burner individually for a reliable start up every time and allows you to light all the burners at the same time. The cast stainless steel wave cooking grids create the trademark Napoleon sear lines and allow for better heat retention. The dual level, stainless steel, sear plates vaporize drippings, control flare ups and keep your food moist. The multifunctional warming rack is designed with special cutouts for grilling wings and appetizers. This Phantom Prestige 500 also has a 18,000 BTU rear infrared burner and rotisserie kit for roasting and a 14,000 BTU infrared side burner for searing meats. The hood features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge, cast aluminum end caps and retains heat for oven-like performance. The SafetyGlow control knobs turn from blue to red when a burner is in use. Clean up is a cinch with the full width removable drip pan. The grill cart is made of durable, rust and corrosion resistant black steel, features folding shelves with integrated utensil holders, double doors for storage and easy roll locking casters for moving the grill around. This Napoleon grill is manufactured in Canada.This grill features an accessory package, which includes a grill cover, charcoal tray, rotisserie basket, and drip trays.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Phantom Prestige 500 Propane Grill Bundle w/Cover, Charcoal Tray, Rotisserie Basket & Drip Trays
Description:
Key FeaturesGrill in style with premium Phantom matte black finished surfacesMultifunctional warming rack designed with cutouts for grilling wings and appetizersSafetyGlow Night Light illuminated controlsInfrared rear burner & rotisserie kit allows you to slow roast food with restaurant quality resultsHigh heat infrared side burner allows you to sear just like a steakhouseThe Napoleon Phantom Prestige 500 blends quality and performance into one package and features edgy styling with luxurious matte black finishes. This freestanding propane grill has four stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 48,000 BTUs of cooking power. The grill has cast stainless steel cooking grates with 500 square inches of main cooking area and 240 square inches across the stainless steel multifunctional warming rack for a total of 740 square inches of cooking area. The Napoleon Jetfire ignition with crossover lighting starts each burner individually for a reliable start up every time and allows you to light all the burners at the same time. The cast stainless steel wave cooking grids create the trademark Napoleon sear lines and allow for better heat retention. The dual level, stainless steel, sear plates vaporize drippings, control flare ups and keep your food moist. The multifunctional warming rack is designed with special cutouts for grilling wings and appetizers. This Phantom Prestige 500 also has a 18,000 BTU rear infrared burner and rotisserie kit for roasting and a 14,000 BTU infrared side burner for searing meats. The hood features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge, cast aluminum end caps and retains heat for oven-like performance. The SafetyGlow control knobs turn from blue to red when a burner is in use. Clean up is a cinch with the full width removable drip pan. The grill cart is made of durable, rust and corrosion resistant black steel, features folding shelves with integrated utensil holders, double doors for storage and easy roll locking casters for moving the grill around. This Napoleon grill is manufactured in Canada.This grill features an accessory package, which includes a grill cover, charcoal tray, rotisserie basket, and drip trays.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Phantom Rogue SE 425 Propane Grill w/ Infrared Rear Burner & Infrared Side Burner - RSE425RSIBPK-1-PHM
Description: Key FeaturesGrill in style with premium Phantom matte black finished surfacesMultifunctional warming rack designed with cutouts for grilling wings and appetizersHigh heat infrared side burner allows you to sear just like a steakhouseRear infrared rotisserie burner allows you to slow roast food with restaurant quality resultsGrill cart features, tool hooks, folding side shelves, propane tank stability ring, and easy locking caster wheelsGoing Rogue has Never Tasted So Good Napoleon put a great deal of thought into designing their Rogue series of gas grills. They packed performance into an eye-catching form and created freestanding grills with carts that are more than just a stand for a grill. Phantom Matte Black Finished Surfaces If you dont want to be like everybody else on the block with a shiny silver-ish grill, Napoleons Phantom Rogue SE 425 RSIB Propane Grill offers edgy styling with luxurious, silky black matte finishes. Napoleon refers to it as low-key luxury, but it's more than just a look these grills offer high performance AND high styling! Infrared Rear Rotisserie Burner Perfect for high heat searing and slow spit roasting for succulent roasted meals. (Rotisserie kit sold separately) Large Infrared Sizzle Zone™ Side Burner Get the perfect steakhouse-quality sear! The Phantom Rogue SE 425 RSIB's IR side burner is more efficient and gets much hotter (up to 1,800 degrees F!) than a conventional burner, giving it the power to quickly sear meat and deliver the much-desired caramelized crust, sealing in flavor and juices. With an infrared burner, you're actually cooking with the power of light energy. 3 Stainless Steel Burners Burners are the heart of any gas grill. Napoleon's 16-gauge premium 304 stainless steel burner tubes are reinforced and feature an industry-leading design that provides proven longevity, performance, and efficiency. Complete combustion is the key, and these burners balance fuel and oxygen to generate a clean burn. Dual gas ports on the top and sides of each burner ensure even heating along the burner and produced fewer flare-ups. Instant JETFIRE™ Ignition If a grill doesn't reliably light, it's not a reliable grill. Napoleon's Instant JETFIRE ignition lights the first time, every time. The design sends a jet of flame to light each burner individually. You can light your grill with the twist of your writs. Batteries not required! With cross-lighting burners, in the unlikely event that a burner goes out or fails to light, it automatically relights. There's a cross-light bracket between burners that passes flame to the unlit burner, assuring safe and reliable grilling. High Top Lid Napoleon Rogue heavy-duty high top lids pivot on a central point to keep the opening within the same space as the body of the grill. In addition, though the lids are heavy, the design provides leverage to easily lift the grill's lid. The higher height gives you space to grill larger meats, and the double layer of insulation works to keep the heat in and helps it circulate for greater heat control. Stainless Steel Iconic Wave Cooking Grids Never underestimate the power of heavy-duty stainless steel cooking grids! As you can see, the Wave design is like no other and it's not just because they look cool. The wave encourages even heating and provides more surface area, prevents food from falling through, and keeps the grill cleaner. The shape increases the grates' longevity by allowing for even expansion and contraction, reducing the effect that heat and cold have on the metal. Backlit Ergonomic Control Knobs Like the feel of a steering wheel, or the knobs of a high-end stereo, the smooth grip and robust shape of the Rogue knobs give you excellent control. Illuminated to prevent the where do I have everything set? guessing game after the sun goes down. A Grill Cart that is Much More than Just a Cart The Phantom Rogue SE 425 RSIB's cart is functional and offers features not generally found at this price point. The enclosed design protects the contents from the elements and provides long-lasting durability. Each cart includes a built-in propane tank ring to secure the tank and improve safety, especially when moving the grill. There are tool hooks on each side shelf to help you keep your grilling tools within reach without cluttering up the stainless steel folding shelf, and a condiment basket to store your favorite spices and sauces. The cart rests on locking casters for extra stability. Napoleon Phantom Rogue SE 425 FAQCan I convert the Rogue SE 425 propane grill to natural gas?Napoleon grills are gas specific and shouldn't be modified in any way. Fortunately, we carry the Phantom Rogue SE 425 Natural Gas version!How big is the Phantom Rogue SE 425 RSIB?The Rogue SE 425 RSIB is 55-in wide with the shelf up, 25-in deep, and 48.5-in high. It weighs 144 lbs. The main cooking grid is 23.5 x 18 inches, for a main grilling area of 425 square inches. Title: Napoleon Rogue 425 Propane Gas Grill - Black - R425PK-1
Description:
Key FeaturesJetfire ignition and crossover lighting make start up easyPorcelainized cast iron wave cooking grids for patented Napoleon sear marksDual-level stainless steel sear plates to vaporize drippings, control flare-ups, and keep food moist570 total square feet of grilling area giving plenty of room for all your cooking needsEnclosed grill cart features tool hooks, folding side shelves, and easy locking caster wheelsThe Napoleon Rogue is in a class of its own with affordable options and high quality. The Napoleon Rogue 425 propane gas grill is perfect for the grillmaster that is looking for a premium quality grill with a smaller footprint. It has three stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 42,000 BTUs of cooking power. The Napoleon Rouge 425 features a total of 570 square inches of cooking area between the main grilling area and the extra deep warming rack. The main grilling area is 23.75-inches x 18-inches giving you 425 square inches of prime grilling real estate. The extra-deep chrome plated warming rack is 23.25-inches x 4.86-inches giving you 145 square inches of extra cooking or warming space. The Napoleon battery-free Jetfire ignition ensures a controlled flame and a quick and easy start up every time. Dual-level stainless steel sear plates vaporize drippings, provide even heat distribution, and help keep your food moist while keeping your burners clean. The black porcelain enamel lid is designed to be easy to lift, retains heat for oven-like performance, and features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge for measuring the precise internal temperature of your grill. Reversible porcelain-coated cast iron iconic wave cooking grids deliver those famous Napoleon sear lines, and allows you to quickly sear steaks and chops, locking in flavor. The durable powder-coated enclosed grill cart features a porcelain coated access door, powder coated folding side shelves with integrated tool hooks, built-in propane tank storage ring, and Easy Roll locking casters for moving the grill around. The grill measures 63-inches high with lid open and 35-inches wide with the shelves folded down.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Ultimate Griller Bundle
Description:
Key FeaturesIncludes the 70060 Burger Press Kit, the 70015 Skewer Set, the 56027 Grilling Wok, the 56019 Roasting Rack, the 67013 Smoker Box, and the 67732 Charcoal TrayTwo sizes for making full size burgers or slidersSkewers includes eight to hold multiple combinations of foodBuilt-in handles makes it easy when tossing and mixing vegetablesThe rack is large enough to roast up to 4 racks of ribsThe Gourmet Burger Press Kit by Napoleon is worth having having around the kitchen to ensure that you make the best looking sliders. Has a non-stick surface allowing for the burger to be easily removed and for the cover to be taken off so that you can make stuffed burgers.The Eight Stainless Steel Multifunctional Skewers create the best portions for dinner. Can be reused and are made of stainless steel, so they can be placed in the dishwasher. Cook with these over the grill for the best sear marks or you can also use them indirect grilling for a slower roasting method. The rigid ends of the skewers make it so that food will never fall off while grilling.The Grilling Wok is an excellent way grill a side dish of vegetables or smaller food items in general. The perforated style and stainless steel material of the wok makes it great for conducting heat and is dishwasher safe. Cooking is easy with the wok, has built-in handles and the wide/deep design. It is best to use heat resistant gloves or tongs when touching the handles while grilling.This 3-in-1 Roasting Rack by Napoleon is an excellent way to roast meats like chicken, pork roast, and beef for a convection style of cooking. The 62008 Large Grill Drip Tray (not included) fits underneath the rack to catch the juices that fall. You can convert the rack into a beer can chicken roaster by flipping the rack over. It can also be used for sliding up to 4 racks of ribs, making it so that there is more airflow and less of chance for the meat being charred.Add a smoky flavor to your favorite meal with the Napoleon Stainless Steel Sear Plate Smoker Box. This durable smoker box replaces the sear plate on your Napoleon Grill giving you the ability to enjoy the flavor of wood smoke while using your gas grill. Fill this high capacity box with your favorite flavor of wood chips and amaze your guests with each flavorful bite. Designed for use with Napoleon Prestige Pro, Prestige, and Rogue Series gas grills.The Charcoal Tray for Napoleon Gas Grills are easy to use and gives the option of using charcoal to cook any meal. Insert the charcoal tray, add charcoal, and start grilling. The gas burner lights the charcoal, conveniently giving you the taste of charcoal grilled food.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Easy Prep Bundle
Description:
Key FeaturesIncludes the 70012 PRO Bamboo Cutting Board & Stainless Steel Bowl Set, the 55028 Marinade Injector, the 70060 Burger Press Kit, and the 55005 Basting BrushIncludes two stainless steel bowls which conveniently hide inside the cutting boardTwo interchangeable needles for injecting thin liquids and thick marinadesSmaller press for making stuffed burgersThe silicone bristles holds the sauce allowing you to quickly baste the meatThe Napoleon bamboo cutting board includes two stainless steel bowls. Bamboo is durable and anti-bacterial, making it perfect for prepping food for the grill. The two stainless steel bowls hide away conveniently inside the cutting board. The smart design also includes a trough which captures juices and directs them into bowls through the handles.This Stainless Steel Marinade Injector is amazing for making your food more flavorful and preventing dryness at the same time. The window of the injector allows for the measurements to be shown as ounces and teaspoons. There are two interchangeable needles you can switch between and should be used based on the thickness of the fluid you are using. The smaller gauge is used for liquids that have a thin wine based concentration, and the thicker gauge is better for marinades that have small solids. Also included is a storage case that helps you keep everything together.The Gourmet Burger Press Kit is worth having having around the kitchen to ensure that you make the best looking sliders. Has a non-stick surface allowing for the burger to be easily removed and for the cover to be taken off so that you can make stuffed burgers.The PRO Silicon Basting Brush is a durable tool to have for the grill, with a stainless steel handle finish. The heat resistant silicone brush is excellent for holding juices and not letting any of the sauce fall off while basting. The stainless steel handle makes it easy to wash, and can safely be placed in the dishwasher. Small enough to fit in your kitchen tool drawer with ease.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Premium Pizza Stone - 70084
Description:
Key FeaturesGet restaurant quality results when making pizzaThis premium pizza stone is perfect for bread, desserts, appetizers, and cookiesPreheat the pizza stone in the oven or barbecue grill before cookingLike your favorite cast iron frying pan, this stone will season over timeIt is recommended that you hand wash your premium pizza stone by handNapoleon's premium pizza stone is perfect for the barbecue grill and baking in the oven too. The porous stone pulls moisture away from your pizza crust, pastries, and breads, yielding crispy and light results. The stone is a natural heat conductor and distributes heat evenly. You can use a Baking Stone to ensure that your barbecue or oven are heating evenly, increasing efficiency when baking. The natural surface doesn't retain odors and flavors; so last week's garlic pizza won't flavor this week's homestyle honey biscuits. Like your favorite cast iron frying pan, this stone will season over time, creating a non-stick surface and making it more effective. It is recommended that you hand wash your premium pizza stone by hand, with warm water, once completely cooled. Avoid soapy water and scrubbing. Whether you are cooking a fresh or frozen pizza, reheating last night's pizza, or baking your favorite pastries, cookies, breads, or desserts, the pizza stone ensures the best results.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Napoleon Cedar Grilling Plank - 67034
Description:
Key Features100% natural, untreated cedar plankPairs best with seafood, but also great for vegetables, tofu, pork, chicken and steakProduces both smoke and steam which will keep your food moist and flavorfulCan be safely reused until approximately 50% charredEasy to use—soak for an hour, place on preheated grill, & get cooking!Specifically made for plank grilling, the Napoleon Cedar Plank will add a sweet and smoky flavor to any food you wish to barbecue. Pairing best with seafood, cedar is also great for flavoring vegetables, tofu, pork, chicken and steak. The cooking process produces both smoke and steam which will keep your food moist and flavorful. Napoleon Cedar grilling planks are thicker than most other planks on the market. This means that they are reusable. Simply pre-soak the 100% untreated natural cedar planks in cold water for at least one hour before use to ensure consistent burn and smoke. Then place the plank and food onto a preheated barbecue. When the food is finished, rinse the cedar barbecue plank thoroughly with water and scrape off any food residue. Any stubborn residue can be sanded off. Do not use soap. Allow the plank to dry completely before storing. A plank can be reused until it is approximately 50% charred. The Cedar grilling plank is great for experimental grillers and impressing your guests, these hassle-free planks are easy to use and disposable.Legal disclaimers and warnings
